description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.
name: weatherapi.com.forecast_weather_api

description: Weather Insight Pro - Gain comprehensive insights with an unparalleled 16-day weather forecast, including detailed AQI reports for over 4 million locations worldwide. Tailor your experience in metric or imperial units to suit any need and receive localized forecasts directly at the coordinates of interest (Longitude, Latitude).
name: weather_insight_pro_advanced_forecast
